DOC.brief_summary: Serum levels of bupivacaine over time after peri-articular injection of a mixture of liposomal bupivacaine and plain bupivacaine during total knee arthroplasty.
DOC.brief_title: Serum Bupivacaine Concentration Levels After Injection of Liposomal Bupivacaine Into the Knee
DOC.criteria: Adults of at least 18 years of age having a primary, unilateral total knee arthroplasty with a surgical plan to have an intraarticular injection of a mixture of 266 mg of Exparel, 125 mg of bupivacaine, 1:300,000 epinephrine, and 0.9% saline to make a total volume of 100 ml. Known hepatic dysfunction or renal insufficiency (creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL); allergy to the study medications; pregnancy; incarceration; inability to communicate with the investigators; morbid obesity (body mass index > 40 kg/m2).
